name: Sommia Etwas Alles
description: Sommia Etwas Alles is a text adventure game inspired by '60s sci-fi.  Play as a variety of different human and mutant characters, brave the strange environments of the Barren Corridor, and experience life in 2998.  Gameplay is divided into choice-based narrative sections, turn-based combat, and exploration of both alien and mundane environments.  Major influences include the works of Phillip K. Dick and Frank Herbert, Star Trek: The Original Series, and the philosophies of Albert Camus and Friedrich Nietzsche.  This project is currently a work in progress and feedback is always appreciated.
